hcc_text: Van Cortlandt Avenue East is a pedestrian high crash corridor (top third for pedestrian deaths and serious injuries per mile in the Bronx)
info: At Van Cortlandt Avenue East and East Mosholu Parkway North, there was 1 severe injury in crashes between 2008 and 2012.
intersection: Van Cortlandt Avenue East and East Mosholu Parkway North
